Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6228 affecting package libtiff for versions less than 4.6.0-6
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-6228 affecting package libtiff for versions less than 4.6.0-6. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libtiff is earlier than 4.6.0-6, affected by CVE-2023-6228
